data.sentence: The word مَا comes from the root م ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word قُلْنَا comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
The word عَنْ comes from the root ع ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كُونُوا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: to cling to the ground, lie in dust, become abject or mean. qiradatan - apes, monkeys.
data.sentence: The word قِرَدَةً comes from the root ق ر د and is associated with the meanings: to cling to the ground, lie in dust, become abject or mean. qiradatan - apes, monkeys.

data.meanings: To drive away (a dog), to be dazzled/confused and dim (said of the sight), to be driven away/repelled, throw stones at another.
data.sentence: The word خَاسِئِينَ comes from the root خ س ا and is associated with the meanings: To drive away (a dog), to be dazzled/confused and dim (said of the sight), to be driven away/repelled, throw stones at another.
The word عَنْهُ comes from the root ع ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: (Nun-ha-Waw) to prevent, forbid, chide away, prohibit, make one to stop from, restrain, interdict, hinder, desist, refrain.
data.sentence: The word نُهُوا comes from the root ن ه ي and is associated with the meanings: (Nun-ha-Waw) to prevent, forbid, chide away, prohibit, make one to stop from, restrain, interdict, hinder, desist, refrain.

data.meanings: to drag, push violently, draw along, pull, carry anyone away forcibly. atiya - to be quick to do evil. utuyyun - prone/quick to do evil, wicked, rough, glutton, rude, hard-hearted ruffian, cruel, greedy, violent, ignoble, ill-mannered. atiyatin - blowing with extraordinary force.
data.sentence: The word عَتَوْا comes from the root ع ت و and is associated with the meanings: to drag, push violently, draw along, pull, carry anyone away forcibly. atiya - to be quick to do evil. utuyyun - prone/quick to do evil, wicked, rough, glutton, rude, hard-hearted ruffian, cruel, greedy, violent, ignoble, ill-mannered. atiyatin - blowing with extraordinary force.
